name: Atlas' Journey
description:
CONTROLS;

B - Jump, Hold B again in midair to hover upwards.

A - Quack (useless)

D-PAD - Movement

Atlas' Journey is a platformer game made for the GameBoy Colour using GB-Studio.

The game is inspired by other classic platformers such as Kirby's Dream Land and Rocket Knight Adventures. 

It is intended to be difficult, but not impossible, so have fun!

Please keep in mind this game is still in development, and there isn't much content as of yet.
